title: Special Event: Lantern Celebration
short_description: Join us for this special event celebrating the close of the Chinese New Year
list_description: Join us for this special event celebrating the close of the Chinese New Year
description:
Saturday, March 3, 1:00–7:30 (Art Institute 1:00-5:00, Maggie Daley Park 5:30-7:30)

3月3日 星期六 下午1点 至5点

Celebrate the close of Chinese New Year and the opening of Mirroring China’s Past: Emperors and Their Bronzes with a visit to the exhibition, storytelling, Chinese music, and a lantern-making workshop for all ages. Enjoy festive food and drink in the museum’s restaurants, and join a procession of glowing lanterns at sundown to Maggie Daley Park led by a Chinese lion dance.

在庆祝中国春节之际，迎来了“吉金鉴古：皇室和文人的青铜器收藏”展览的开幕，请到博物馆来参观展览、听故事、欣赏中国音乐和无论老少都能参加的灯笼制作等系列活动。在博物馆餐室享用节日风味美食，在日落时分和我们一起点亮亲手制作的灯笼， 加入由中国舞狮表演队带领的活动。

Presented with the Chinese Fine Arts Society, Maggie Daley Park, and Chicago Park District

Support for Live Arts programming is provided by the Woman's Board of the Art Institute of Chicago

本活动由芝加哥艺术博物馆、中华才艺协会和芝加哥麦琪戴利公园联合举办。现场艺术活动由芝加哥艺术博物馆女性董事会大力支持。

 

>Schedule of Events
活动时间表 1:00–5:00 Lantern Making (Ryan Learning Center Studios) 灯笼制作 (Ryan 教育中心)2:00, 3:00, and 4:00 Stories and Music with Norman Garcy Yap and Li Guang Long (Griffin Court) 跟叶加驷、Li Guang Long一起讲故 事、听音乐 (Griffin大厅)3:00-4:15Music of China: Past and Present featuring Yang Wei (pipa), the F-PLUS Trio, and Unheard-of//Ensemble（Fullerton Hall） 中国音乐：前世与今生 特邀嘉宾：杨惟琵琶表演、the F-PLUS三人乐队、the Unheard-of 乐 (Fullerton Hall)5:00-5:15Line up for Lion Dance-led Lantern Procession (Modern Wing Entrance) 灯笼队伍和舞狮表演列队准备 (现代馆入口)5:30-6:00Lion Dance-led Lantern Procession (From Millennium Park to Maggie Daley Park across the BP Bridge) 舞狮表演和灯笼游行队正式开始 (从千禧公园穿过BP步行桥到对面的麦琪戴利公园)6:00-6:15Figure Skate Chicago and Chicago Skates Synchro Team members Skate the Ribbon (Maggie Daley Park Skating Ribbon) 花样滑冰表演 (麦琪戴利公园Skating Ribbon滑冰场)

6:30

>6:30–7:30

Lion Dance Finale (Maggie Daley Park Concession Area)

>Year of the Dog Crafts (Maggie Daley Park Field House) 狗年工艺品制作活动 (麦琪戴利公园活动厅)
